name: Steve
coverLetter:
Hey Guy's,
I saw your ad for grower's and trimmers and it caught my attention, as it's my passion to grow quality cannabis and maintain a healthy garden. So, I've been growing on and off for the past 15 years for personal use and experimentation (cloning, scroging, LST, temps, humidity levels etc... Agriculture has always been a hobby of mine so I do have some knowledge. I seriously want to get into the Medical Cannabis industry full-time as it is and always will be my passion. I am a team player ready and willing to give a 110 percent to assist with a strong team.

Look forward to hearing from you,
Thx Steve  (available now)
